ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of INDIRA V. SAMARASEKERA, O.C., of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a federal member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of 18 months.
